title: How to Dork Your Diary
description: Create your own Dork Diary with this special, interactive addition to the #1 New York Times bestselling Dork Diaries series!Nikki Maxwell can't believe it when one morning she can't find her diary! The hunt is on, and while she looks, Nikki can't help putting together a list of important diary-keeping lessons to remember in case of missing diary emergencies like this one.How to Dork Your Diary is chock-full of tips from Nikki on fun things to write about in your diary, with lots of space for readers to write and draw their own entries.
author: Rachel Ren√©e Russell
